message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Is there any wiggle room on your end?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $11,000 is a bit too low for me to accept. Would you consider meeting in the middle at $11,250?
I'm not willing to go above $11,000. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider accepting this price?
